instructions: Image titled Search for a Drafted Review on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 1 1 Download, install and open the Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore app. Tap the Yelp app button to begin. Image titled Search for a Drafted Review on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 2 2 Login to the app (if you haven't logged in yet. ) Use the same credentials as you do for the PC version. For those of you wishing to create an account, unfortunately, there is no account creation process yet from the app directly. Image titled Search for a Drafted Review on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 3 3 Tap the "About Me"/"Home" button on the black taskbar at the bottom of the Yelp screen. Image titled Search for a Drafted Review on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 4 4 Scroll the screen up just a little bit, until the line "Review Drafts" is displayed. Tap the Review Drafts button when this button appears. Image titled Search for a Drafted Review on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 5 5 Tap the drafted review you'd like to finish and (perhaps even) publish via the app. Advertisement
